My teenage so wanted this watch and I bought it thinking  it would probably feel cheap and be hard to size but I was SO wrong. I worked in the jewelry industry for a long time and sold watches of all quality and price ranges - and I have sized thousands of watch bands. This inexpensive timepiece was beautifully package, has a nice weight to it, works, and was super simple to size with the handy tool they included. Really impressed! He won't be wearing it all the time so I  hope it holds up to normal or infrequent wear. Much of that will depend on how he takes care of it 😊

评论概述: WATERPROOF UP TO 30 METERS YOU SAY!?!?
评论详情: I highly recommend keeping this watch at least 30 meters away from water!  While in my possession - the only water this watch ever encountered was under the faucets of my kitchen and bathroom sinks - AT SEA LEVEL!  This watch lasted a TOTAL of 57 days before the lens completely fogged up.  If you look at the photo you can see 3 droplet of water under the crystal. The one at the 10 - 11 position being the largest.  If you like removing your “Waterproof Divers Watch” every time you wash your hands…then this is the watch FOR YOU!

I never do reviews, but i had to do one here.  I received the Benyar watch and could not get it running.  I thought i was missing something, so i got a new battery installed and it works great now.  I reached out to the seller, and due to the inconvenience of the dead battery situation they offered me a 40% discount after purchase.  I did not like the dead battery situation as that is why i bought this new watch, because my other watch battery died and i didn't want to bother playing around, so i bought a new one, and in this case it did not work either.  I was disapointed,. not going to lie.  To make a long story short, this company rectified the situation post haste.  I give them a 5 stars for this reason. I appreciate an honorable company.  Thank you Benyar.  I would recommend, and i will buy again.  Love the look of these watches.
The look of the watch is OK for the price but it was dead on arrival. Never has a chance to use it.
